Bearer.description:
Token authorization. Get a token by sending a POST request to `/token` endpoint (JSON-mode, preferred)
or `/token/oauth2` OAuth2-compatible endpoint.
Ensure to use only those permissions that your app actually needs. `full_control` gives access to all permissions of a user
To authorize, send an `Authorization` header with value of `Bearer <token>` (replace `<token>` with your token)

scopes.notification_management: Create, list or edit notification providers
scopes.full_control: Full control over what current user has

BearerOptional.description: Same as Bearer, but not required. Logic for unauthorized users depends on current endpoint
